author: Adam Jeffery
title: In photos: Religion around the world in the age of coronavirus
description: With strict stay-at-home orders, social distancing measures and even some country-wide lockdowns, the faithful and religious leaders have had to find alternative and creative ways to bring their services and communities together in these trying times.
content:
Millions are celebrating Easter weekend and Passover separated from their families, friends and religious communities as the coronavirus lays siege on much of the world.
With strict stay-at-home orders, social distancing measures and even some countrywide lo… [+807 chars]
